comments.en:
Multifunction device: print/copy/scan/fax.

PC faxing not yet supported.

High-end variation of the OfficeJet G55 theme, with automatic document feeder (ADF), fax capability, print duplexer, and JetDirect 170X print server; see that entry for scanning and other driver information. Use the "hpijs", "cdj970" or "pcl3" driver for duplex support, the "hpijs" from HP gives the best output quality.

The best output one gets with HP's HPIJS 1.3 or newer. If you cannot update to HPIJS 1.3 for some reason, you can also use HPIJS 1.2.2 with the patches from Matthias Bunte and Richard Spencer-Smith ("hpijs-rss"). The GIMP-Print driver also works (Model setting: "pcl-900"), but only up to 600 dpi.

For printing via USB you NEED to set up this printer with HPOJ, even if you do not want to scan. Only using the modified USB printer.c kernel module from the HPOJ web site does not work with this model.
